amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 116-14 to allow the transfer of firearms to individuals who participate in the TSA Pre-Check program of the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allow gun owners to legally transfer their firearms to individuals who have been approved and are participants in TSA's PreCheck program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 250 (Roll no. 96).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Lesko.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 250 (Roll no. 96).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
